settings.heading: Transformational Life Coaching in London
settings.description:
Transformational Life Coaching helps you see new possibilities and create a future you actually want. It isn’t advice—it’s partnership, reflection and practice.

As you transition chapters or tackle a personal challenge, a coach holds space, asks better questions and helps you build the inner skills to make durable change.

settings.heading: What is Transformational Life Coaching?
settings.text:
Transformational life coaching focuses on self-awareness and behavior—so you can make changes that last.

We use an embodied approach (mind, body, soul) to help you realign with your core blueprint and design a life that actually fits.

settings.heading: Who this is for
settings.text:
If some of these resonate, you’re in the right place:

  • Successful on paper, yet it feels oddly empty.
  • You’ve proven yourself—now you want meaning, not just performance.
  • You feel stuck in patterns that used to work… until they didn’t.
  • You miss the playful, alive version of you.
  • You’re ready to look honestly and make real changes.

settings.heading: Benefits you can expect
settings.text:
Self-awareness & self-management

Understand your patterns and regulate emotions so you lead yourself (and others) better.

Better relationships

Transform how you relate—to self, partners, family and colleagues.

Emotional intelligence

See clearly, listen deeply, and respond instead of react.

settings.heading: Deeper outcomes
settings.text:
Lead with desire

Use desire as a compass, not fear.

Thrive in conflict

Have intense conversations with ease and create win-wins.

Whole-life impact

As one area shifts, others follow—personal, relational, and professional.

settings.heading: Our Approach
settings.text:
At Nibana, our holistic approach connects you back to your core blueprint. We build self-awareness, deepen relationship to life and people around you, and help you shift from finite games to an infinite one.

Identity work

Understand who you are and how you got here—so your choices start matching your truth.

Boundaries

See where you say Yes when you mean No (and the reverse). Create clean physical, emotional and energetic boundaries.

Victim → Observer

Shift from “life is happening to me” to “life is happening for me.” It’s a powerful lens change.

Inner child

Spot the early beliefs driving today’s decisions and rewrite them—gently and for good.

Shadow work

Integrate the parts you’ve pushed away and unlock their power.

Archetypes

Get conscious of the masks you wear—so you can choose them, not be run by them.

Core beliefs

  • Self-worth and value (inherent vs. earned)
  • Enoughness and belonging
  • Lovability without performance

Inner skills

Attention, mindfulness, energy accounting, masculine–feminine dynamics, embodiment, desire cycle, responsiveness over reactivity—and more.

Practice

Peak experiences are great; disciplined practice makes change stick. We help you build the rituals that make transformation durable.

Play

Live life as an infinite game—choose play and mystery over winning and control.

Unlock your potential

Growth lives beyond your comfort zone. Build the inner safety to go there—and enjoy it.
